name: Lightweight
desc: Sprinting speed is increased by 5% and fall damage is greatly reduced.

name: Agile
desc: Object mantling speed is increased and the aim time of weapons after sprinting is reduced.

name: Flak Jacket
desc: Explosive damage is reduced by 35%. Throwing back a grenade resets time. Reduces the continuous damage from Molotov Cocktail and Thermite.

name: Skulker
desc: Move 12% faster when walking and crouching.

name: Tactician
desc: Spawn with an extra piece of tactical equipment.

name: Restock
desc: Recharges equipment over 25 seconds. Replenishes one Combat Axe.

name: Overclock
desc: Increases the charging speed of the Operator Skill.

name: Martyrdom
desc: Drop a live grenade upon death.

name: Iron Lungs
desc: Hold your breath longer for steadier sniper shots.

name: Pin Point
desc: Outline enemies when dealing or taking weapon damage and enhance aim assist.

name: Dauntless
desc: All burning damage received is reduced and movement speed debuffs have no affect.
